executable_image Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Defines an executable image embedded into the kernel image.

The executable images are linked together into a linked list. The linked list is built at link time, see the kernel link script.

Definition at line 197 of file kernel.h.

Field Documentation

struct executable_image* const executable_image::next [read]

Points to the next executable image.

The last executable image in the list will have a next pointer equal to 0, i.e., null.
